content.question: <math alttext="the limit as h approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator 5 times e raised to the x power, minus 5 times e raised to the x plus h power, and denominator 3 times h, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 5 times e raised to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="5 times e raised to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative five thirds times e raised to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="five thirds times e raised to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative five thirds times e raised to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 2.7: Derivatives of cos x, sin x, ex, and ln x
